alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:08PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Union and southwestern Wallowa Counties through 400 PM PDT... At 308 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of North Powder, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Enterprise, Union, Joseph, Cove, Lostine, Pondosa and Telocaset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Pendleton Oregon.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County
